relevant_findings.HEENT: sclera anicteric, mucus membranes moist, nares clear, trachea at midline
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: regular rate, rhythm. Systolic ejection murmur, soft.
relevant_findings.abdominal: hypoactive bowel sounds, moderately distended, tympanic to percussion. TTP in epigastrium and RUQ with + ___.
relevant_findings.neurological: alert, oriented to person, place, time
